topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54829c866368721b1e610000#post_54829c866368721b1e610000
Pumpkin Hill.
Increases physical strength for as long as the user remains on the ground. The moment the user is air-born the stand loses it's powers completely.
